content: mushroom guy crochet pattern by neatly stitched before you start please read the pattern in full before you start crocheting it will give you a better sense of how the toy is made and assembled at the end the pattern is worked in row joined with slip_stitch therefore each row starts with chain 1 and the first stitch goes in the 2nd loop from the hook the pattern uses us terminology magic_ring is always r1 the pattern uses offset increases and decreases to create more round and smooth shapes the finished toy measures approximately 15 cm 6 if you want a bigger toy you can change the yarn weight and hook size accordingly materials note the yarn i used 2/sport/fine weight yarn in colors cream yarnart jeans 55% cotton red white and pink optional 45% pac in colors 2 5mm crochet hook #05 - cream stuffing of your choice #90 - red tapestry needle #01 - white x2 7mm safety eyes #74 - pink optional scissors pins abbreviations magic_ring - magic_ring chain - chain single_crochet - single_crochet increase - increase decrease - decrease double_crochet - double_crochet r# - row number #
